We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AverageDirectionalMovementIndexRating _adxr;
// In Initialize()
_adxr = ADXR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_adxr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADXR A D X", _adxr.ADX);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ADXR Current", _adxr.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.adxr = self.ADXR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.adxr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADXR A D X", self.adxr.ADX);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ADXR Current", self.adxr.Current);
